attributes.action: Create A Law Which Makes All ISP (Internet Service Providors) Responsible for Regulating Their Own Content
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Take Steps and Where Appropriate Create New Laws With The Aim of Making All ISP (Internet Service Providors) Responsible for Poliecing and Regulating Content On Their Own Sites and Services; and Where Needed Eliminate Inapropriate Violent, Sexual, and Offencive Content In Recognition Of The Fact That The Material Produced Has Been Done so By Abusing and Victimising Others
